summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning of work-release and jail facilities requiring dispersion of new or expanding work-release centers; prohibiting work release centers in residental zones; establishing criteria for evaluation of permit applications; requiring Council approval; and modifying definitions and amending Sections 23.44.036, 23.45.106, 23.47.004, 23.47.006, 23.49.046, 23.49.066, 23.49.096,23.49.122,23.49.144, 23.49.148, 23.49 .320, 23.49 .324,23.49.338,23.50,012, 23.54.015, 23.66.122. 23.84.016, 23.84, 020, and 23.84.044 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
